io.logspace.hq.webapp.resource

Class AbstractSpaceResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.indoqa.boot.AbstractJsonResourcesBase
      • io.logspace.hq.webapp.resource.AbstractSpaceResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CapabilitiesResource, EventResource, OrdersResource

    public abstract class AbstractSpaceResource
extends com.indoqa.boot.AbstractJsonResourcesBase
    Base class for resources, which need protection via spaces. See Spaces.
    Consumers must supply the space token header in their request.

      • mapExceptions

        @PostConstruct
public void mapExceptions()

      • getSpace

        protected String getSpace(spark.Request req)
        Extract spaceToken from request headers.
        Parameters:
        req - - Request to extract spaceToken from.
        Returns:
        Extracted spaceToken.
        Throws:
        MissingSpaceTokenException - If the spaceToken Header is missing in the request.
        InvalidSpaceTokenException - If no space is configured for the supplied spaceToken.

      • validateSpace

        protected void validateSpace(spark.Request req)
        Validates the request against its supplied spaceToken Header.
        Delegates to getSpace(Request)
        Parameters:
        req - - Request to validate.
